document.full_text: officers received training biased against the united states at a prestigious pakistan army institution, according to wikileaks, underscoring concern that anti-americanism in the country's powerful military is growing amid strains with washington.
document.title: anti-americanism rife in pakistan army institution: wikileaks
lines_and_colors: officers received training biased against the united states at a prestigious pakistan army institution, according to wikileaks, underscoring concern that anti-americanism in the country's powerful military is growing amid strains with washington.
